actionTemplate.title: Blush placement for round faces
steps: Place “plumping” blush on the apple of the cheek
Blend a softer “atmosphere” blush around it into a circle
Keep edges diffused; do not drag too far down
Tap a little atmosphere blush on nose tip and chin for cohesion
Optional: pull slightly toward temples to add lift

rationaleTemplate: Centered blush keeps the face cute without widening it
Soft edges prevent a harsh, flat round patch
